meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Pam Platt Mike Solano Bonnie Megel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7340.

td.p: Pam Platt, a writer and editor from Louisville, Kentucky
Mike Solano, a speech-language pathology graduate student from Sleepy Hollow, New York
Bonnie Megel, an administrative assistant from Grinnell, Iowa (whose 1-day cash winnings total $31,400)

tr.td: STATES THAT BEGIN WITH CALIFORN
IS THIS A HAT?
(Alex: We'll give you three items. You tell us which one is a hat.)
CATCH THESE MEN
A PETITE DEJEUNER
"S" WORDS
SNL CRACKS US UP

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Do you know the way to this city, the seat of Santa Clara county? Many do, as it\'s California\'s 3rd-most populous city')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Do you know the way to this city, the seat of Santa Clara county? Many do, as it's California's 3rd-most populous city
